sentences.en: "Prices are down 40 per cent since Christmas," he lamented.
sentences.cn: “圣诞节以来物价降了4成，”他悲叹道。

sentences.en: About six thousand people were arrested, several hundred of whom have since been released.
sentences.cn: 约六千人被逮捕，不过他们中有几百人后来被释放了。

sentences.en: He lost his job five years ago, but has since found other work.
sentences.cn: 他五年前失去工作，但此后找到了其他工作。

sentences.en: He's been in a stew since early this morning.
sentences.cn: 他从今天一大早就焦虑不安。

sentences.en: I haven’t played rugby since I left university.
sentences.cn: 我大学毕业后就没打过橄榄球。

sentences.en: I left school in 1995, and since then I’ve lived in London.
sentences.cn: 我 1995 年离开学校，此后就在伦敦生活。

sentences.en: I've been here, oh, since the end of June.
sentences.cn: 我是，呃，6月底来到这里的。

sentences.en: I've had the hots for him ever since he came to college.
sentences.cn: 自从他来上大学后，我就对他春心萌动。

sentences.en: It was exactly five years since her father had died.
sentences.cn: 从她父亲去世到现在正好满五年。

sentences.en: It's been 200 years since the passage of the Bill of Rights.
sentences.cn: 《人权法案》通过已经200年了。

sentences.en: It's, what, eleven years or more since he's seen him.
sentences.cn: 打从他上次见他，已有，嗯，11年甚至更久了。

sentences.en: Jacques Arnold has been a member of parliament since 1987.
sentences.cn: 雅克·阿诺德自1987年以来一直是议会议员。

sentences.en: Rock'n'roll has become so commercialised and safe since punk.
sentences.cn: 摇滚乐自从朋克乐以后就已经过于商业化而缺乏新意了。

sentences.en: Rock'n'roll has become so commercialized and safe since punk.
sentences.cn: 自朋克乐之后，摇滚乐已经变得太商业化、太保守了。

sentences.en: She had shared responsibility for her brother since girlhood.
sentences.cn: 她还是个小姑娘的时候就分担起照顾弟弟的责任。

sentences.en: She left London ten years ago, and I haven’t seen her since.
sentences.cn: 她十年前离开伦敦，此后我再没有见过她。

sentences.en: Since she knows little Italian, she keeps to herself.
sentences.cn: 因为不怎么懂意大利语，她很少和人交往。

sentences.en: Since she'd offered to babysit, I took her up on it.
sentences.cn: 她既然主动提出帮助照看孩子，我也就同意了。

sentences.en: Since the end of the war, over five thousand prisoners have been released.
sentences.cn: 自从战争结束以后，已有五千多名战俘获释。

sentences.en: The factory has been here since the 1970s.
sentences.cn: 这家工厂从 20 世纪 70 年代起就在这里了。

sentences.en: The nation's unemployment rate has been climbing steadily since last June.
sentences.cn: 自去年6月以来，该国的失业率一直在不断上升。

sentences.en: The satellite had been inactive since its launch two years ago.
sentences.cn: 该卫星自从两年前发射以来一直没起作用。

sentences.en: These Severn Valley woods have been exploited for timber since Saxon times.
sentences.cn: 从撒克逊时代起就开始采伐塞文山谷的这些树林获取木料。

sentences.en: We’ve been waiting here since two o’clock.
sentences.cn: 我们从两点钟开始就在这里等了。

sentences.en: 英文释义：Since you are unable to answer, perhaps we should ask someone else.
sentences.cn: 中文释义： 既然你回答不了，那我们也许该问问别人。

words.tran_cn: 因为；由于；既然；自…以来；自…以后

phrases.tran_cn: 自什么时候起，打什么时候开始

trans.tran_en: When you are talking about an event or situation in the past, you use since to indicate that another event happened at some point later in time
used to give the reason for something
from a particular time or event in the past until the present, or in that period of time
